game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin. Your quest is to find it and bring it back.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to villagers near the forest and gather information about the ruins' location.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact
task.description: Navigate the treacherous traps and puzzles within the ruins to locate the artifact.
